name: IG Pricing table
author: iografica

sections.description:
IG Pricing Table is a simple and easy way plugin to present your offer to your visitors. Create a new pricing table and then copy-paste the shortcode anywhere. IG Pricing table is fully responsive, translatable in your language, customizable and comes with a clean and simple design.

IG Pricing Table includes

  • Easy customization.
  • Fully responsive.
  • Pricing table shortcodes.

Documentation

  • Documentation – Read the plugin documentation.

Any idea or suggestion?

  • Submit your idea – Send us your feedback and suggestions.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Unzip the folder into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release.

1.1

  • Added France translation thanks to Wolforg.

1.2

  • Fixed shortcode error.

1.3

  • Added new welcome page.
  • Better settings page.
  • Minor improvments

short_description: IG Pricing Table plugin will help you to create pricing tables in less than 5 minutes.
